Title: Forethought
Description: Forethought is a behavior testing framework for the .NET platform. Designed to allow requirements to be written in English and executed as tests.
HomeWiki:
Heads Up

The project has moved to GitHub: https://github.com/Fastlite/Forethought
The page editor here has driven me nuts for the last time. This page will continue to remain active for the time being. The latest release is being hosted on GitHub.

Project Description
Forethought is a behavior testing framework for the .NET platform. Designed to allow requirements to be written in English and executed as tests.

Status
Not quite ready for public consumption, but I had to publish. Getting close though, I'll try to keep this status up to date.
